name: Ronin Sacrifice: The Tale of the Last Rabbit
name_original: Ronin Sacrifice: The Tale of the Last Rabbit
description:
The rabbit ronin equipped with his enchanted sword that keeps his soul alive travels to find and rescue the last mate of his kind kidnapped by foxes. Help him to traverse all the levels!

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys to move, SPACE to use sword

ESCAPE to pause, R to restart level
